column5: Get away for a relaxing Texas Gulf Coast vacation. This unit offers 1st class living. Enjoy the conveniences of home in the relaxed surroundings of beach living. There is quick access to swimming, fishing, Schlitterbahn & many restaurants. We have easy access to the resort style swimming pool that is fenced with a shallow area for children, with BBQ access, picnic tables and bathroom accessibility. This townhome is perfect for large families/groups that want to share a beach adventure together!
